sql.contents: CREATE TABLE wp_sdtdl (ID int NOT NULL auto_increment, uniq_id varchar(10), title varchar(255),content longtext,added int,last_edited int,created_by int,assigned_to varchar(255),completed_by varchar(255), last_edited_by VARCHAR(255), edition_allowed TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (ID))
